game.name: Nocturne for Cyl-Hestia
game.categories: Single-player, Full controller support, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Play as a memorialist and investigate a dystopian city in this 3D adventure game. Collect memories, unlock visions, hack encrypted data, and expose the truth in the face of a regime that manipulates memory.
